name: Wcdonald's massacre
description:
You work in a restaurant called My chicken.it was a normal day at work ,until  you get a weird call.

...................

The Game contains two characters Peter and Sam.

They are trying to escape from a killer clown who eats human meat.

Everyone  of them has an end.

..................

Controls:

W A S D  t o move

Lshift to run

E to  interact

F to turn on flashlight

..................

Gameplay time :  20 min_30 min

..................

The Game may have problem in UI if you are going to play in resolution 1280x1024 or below.
